articles.title: Bato dela Rosa moves for Senate to dismiss Sara Duterte’s impeachment case
articles.description: Senator Ronald "Bato" dela Rosa on Tuesday afternoon made a motion in the Senate plenary seeking that the verified impeachment complaint against Vice President Sara Duterte be dismissed.
articles.content:
Senator Ronald "Bato" dela Rosa on Tuesday afternoon made a motion in the Senate plenary seeking that the verified impeachment complaint against Vice President Sara Duterte be dismissed.

articles.content:

articles.title: Nine people dead in attack at school in city of Graz in Austria, says mayor - Europe live
articles.description: Elke Kahr, mayor of Graz, says seven students and one adult among dead after attack at school, with ninth person dead understood to be the attacker
articles.content: From 16m ago 05.48 EDT Nine dead in school attack - Graz mayor Graz mayor Elke Kahr has just told the Austria Press Agency APA that there are nine dead, including seven students, one adult. It is understood that the ninth dead is the perpetrator. Sha... [9141 chars]

articles.title: Caterpillars become ‘crazy option for synthetic chemists’ to make oxygen-doped nanocarbons
articles.description: In-insect synthesis could offer new routes to reach hard-to-make molecules
articles.content: Insects could provide an alternative way of synthesising oxygen-doped molecular nanocarbons that are notoriously difficult to prepare in the lab. Dubbed ‘in-insect synthesis’, the researchers, based in Japan, said the technique could generate new opp... [5037 chars]
